page.title: 03Population
page.content:
The population of Hundon has varied over the years with the lowest recorded being 592 in 1931 and 1421 in the 1981 census. The recorded population statistics on record are :- 1801 - 824; 1811 - 833; 1821 - 956; 1831 -1121; 1841 -1095; 1851 -1218; 1861 -1132; 1871 -1116; 1881 - 885; 1891 - 838; 1901 - 741; 1911 - 727; 1921 - 666; 1931 - 592; 1941 no record 1951 - 579; 1961 -1081; 1971 - 663; 1981 -1421
The sudden rise in the population during the late 1970's was a result of new housing estates at Farmerie Road and Galley Road.
